text: N’uwitwa Dha-nnuni ariwe ntumwa y’Imana Yunusu (iii) mugihe yagenda nawe bamwihakanye abiwe nawe aca yiyumvira yuko twebwe tutazo mushobora, rero yaciye ahamagara ari mumwijima avuga ati:- ntawundi asengwa bimwe vy’ukuri atari wewe gusa uninahazwa, mu vy’ukuri jewe nari muba hemukiye imitima yabo
